title: The 11 Most Comfortable and Flattering Pants, According to Editors
description: When it comes to comfortable pants, you shouldn't have to sacrifice comfort for style. We're making it a goal to invest less in jeans and more in pants and trousers (chic sweatpants also work!) that are not only bearable to wear all day long but also look good. Although we love the look of a cool suit, putting an outfit together can feel overwhelming at times. For those not quite sure where to start, we'd recommend any of these 11 pairs. Thankfully, a lot of our favorite selections are also marked down - leading you to affordable must haves that will become mainstays and wardrobe essentials in your closet. Whether you're looking for something you can rock around the house, an option to wear on date night, or even comfortable pants to update your favorite work outfit, we've got you covered on all fronts. The best part: prices start at $30, so you can get something in your budget, too. We're especially loving all the wide-leg trousers, some lightweight styles that are great for traveling, and cool flared pants that are sure to be Kendrick Lamar-approved. Keep reading to find our top picks.
author: India Yaffe
excerpt: We rounded up the most comfortable pairs of pants that aren't jeans.
